column1: Friends will be received at the Adams Family Funeral Home
column9: from 2:00 P.M. to 4:00 P.M. and from 7:00 P.M.
column10: to 9:00 P.M. A funeral service will be conducted at the funeral home on Tuesday
column14: with Pastor John Miller officiating. Interment will be in Glendale Cemetery.
